DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Fixed Dose Combination Glimepiride Metformin Chinese Type 2 Diabetes Patients Inadequately Controlled With Metformin
DOC.detailed_description: The study consist 2-week screening period , 20-week treatment period , 3-day safety follow-up period . Total study duration 23 week .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Chinese patient type 2 diabetes mellitus , define World Health Organization , diagnose least 1 year time screen visit inadequately control metformin Signed write informed consent Exclusion criterion : Type 1 diabetes mellitus HbA1c < 7 % > 10 % Fasting plasma glucose > 250 mg/dL ( > 13.9 mmol/L ) Age < 18 year Age ≥ 80 year Patients stable daily dose least 1500 mg metformin within 3 month prior screen Patients currently receive receive antidiabetic drug metformin within 3 month prior screen The information intend contain consideration relevant patient 's potential participation clinical trial .
